name: Warlock
shortDescription: Spellcasters who gain power through pacts with otherworldly patrons.
description: Warlocks draw magic from binding agreements with powerful entities. Their magic is limited but potent, refreshed through brief rests and shaped by invocations and pacts.

spellcasting.description: Warlocks use Pact Magic, casting a limited number of spells at the highest level available, regained on a short rest.

features.name: Otherworldly Patron
features.description: You form a pact with a powerful otherworldly being that grants you magical abilities.

features.name: Pact Magic
features.description: You gain access to Pact Magic, allowing you to cast a small number of powerful spells.

features.name: Eldritch Invocations
features.description: You learn powerful invocations that enhance your abilities.

features.name: Pact Boon
features.description: Your patron bestows a pact boon.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Eldritch Invocation
features.description: You gain an additional Eldritch Invocation.

features.name: Otherworldly Patron Feature
features.description: You gain a feature granted by your patron.

features.name: Otherworldly Patron Feature
